title: The Saturday Night Strangler (part two): Episode 139
description:
We return to South Wales in 2002 as the body of Joseph Kappen is exhumed from the grave where he was buried 12 years earlier, after dying from lung cancer at age 48. Was he the serial killer who had murdered 16 year old Sandra, Pauline and Geraldine?

Reference
For this story, I am indebted to the following article by Kevin Toolis in The Guardian newspaper:
https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2003/jan/18/wales.kevintoolis
